movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A mind-bending thriller where a thief enters the subconscious of his targets.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns that reality as he knows it is a simulation controlled by machines.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest foe, the Joker, who plans to plunge Gotham City into chaos.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.
